attributes.action: :We, the healthcare professionals working in the UK, are extremely concerned about the health and safety of 220 000 innocent civilians confined in the small Vanni conflict zone of Northern Sri Lanka.  We believe in the great justice of the British government and request the Prime Minster,  Hon Mr Gordon Brown,  and the foreign secretary, Hon Mr David Miliband, to intervene urgently to stop the human tragedy that is unfolding.  We urge the British government to ensure that :  1) The government of Sri Lanka allow international NGOs to enter Vanni and help the the civilians  2) Sri Lankan armed forces refrain from  bombing and shelling civilian settlements and hospitals  3) Both parties declare an immediate ceasefire and end of hostilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
